item.description:
Join us for Jantar a Caf√© Belo in Everett on August 14, 2010 at 7pm. The address is 158 School Street in Everett right on Everett Square.

There is parking on the side of the restaurant and it's complimentary on Saturday.
You can order the Rodizio which means all you can eat Barbaque buffet for $10.00, but drinks are extra. There will be live music at 9pm and we will be in the lounge.

The website is www.cafebelo.com to learn more about this establishment.

I hope to see you all there on August 14th 2010 at 7 pm.

Gianni

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: Jantar a Cafe Belo Brazilian Restaurant
